name: Winds Of Courage
description:
Controls Move
Use a mouse or touchpad to control the ship using the options in the top left corner.

Winds Of Courage is an exploration game about sailing in a realm of no land, only sea. Go through events, fight pirates, and gather more crew as you make your way to your destination.

There are currently 4 events and a whole lot of pirates to fight, I hope to add many more.

If you make it to the end, I commend your effort, but I didn't have time to set up the final event. I hope to add more content as I have time available. This has been one of my most passionate projects so far and I appreciate you taking the time to try it.

Originally made in 72 hours for Mini-Jam 77
Theme: Courage Limitation: Not on Earth

Programming, Design, by Michael Williams - Bouncing Turtle
Music, Ben Nissimov - https://soundcloud.com/bennissimov
